Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: speedtest-cli
Description: Command line interface for testing internet bandwidth using speedtest.net

Arguments.Name: --help
Arguments.Description: Show this help message and exit

Arguments.Name: --no-download
Arguments.Description: Do not perform download test

Arguments.Name: --no-upload
Arguments.Description: Do not perform upload test

Arguments.Name: --single
Arguments.Description: Only use a single connection instead of multiple. This simulates a typical file transfer

Arguments.Name: --bytes
Arguments.Description: Display values in bytes instead of bits. Does not affect the image generated by --share, nor the output from --json or --csv

Arguments.Name: --share
Arguments.Description: Generate and provide a URL to the speedtest.net share results image, not displayed with --csv

Arguments.Name: --simple
Arguments.Description: Suppress verbose output, only show basic information

Arguments.Name: --csv
Arguments.Description: Suppress verbose output, only show basic information in CSV format. Speeds listed in bit/s and not affected by --bytes

Arguments.Name: --csv-delimiter
Arguments.Description: Single character delimiter to use in CSV ouput. Default ','

Arguments.Name: CSV_DELIMITER
Arguments.Description: CSV_DELIMITER

Arguments.Name: --csv-header
Arguments.Description: Print CSV headers

Arguments.Name: --json
Arguments.Description: Suppress verbose output, only show basic information in JSON format. Speeds listed in bit/s and not affected by --bytes

Arguments.Name: --list
Arguments.Description: Display a list of speedtest.net servers sorted by distance

Arguments.Name: --server
Arguments.Description: Specify a server ID to test against. Can be supplied multiple times

Arguments.Name: SERVER
Arguments.Description: SERVER

Arguments.Name: --exclude
Arguments.Description: Exclude a server from selection. Can be supplied multiple times

Arguments.Name: EXCLUDE
Arguments.Description: EXCLUDE

Arguments.Name: --mini
Arguments.Description: URL for the Speedtest Mini server

Arguments.Name: MINI
Arguments.Description: MINI

Arguments.Name: --source
Arguments.Description: Source IP address to bind to

Arguments.Name: SOURCE
Arguments.Description: SOURCE

Arguments.Name: --timeout
Arguments.Description: HTTP timeout in seconds. Default 10

Arguments.Name: TIMEOUT
Arguments.Description: TIMEOUT

Arguments.Name: --secure
Arguments.Description: Use HTTPS instead of HTTP when communicating with speedtest.net operated servers

Arguments.Name: --no-pre-allocate
Arguments.Description: Do not pre allocate upload data. Pre allocation is enabled by default to improve upload performance. To support systems with insufficient memory, use this option to avoid a MemoryError

Arguments.Name: --version
Arguments.Description: Show the version number and exit
